document.full_text: "mad men" will return to the air in early 2012 for a final three-season run, the creator of the ad-agency drama said on thursday after announcing a resolution of tense contract negotiations.
document.title: "mad men" to return for final three seasons
lines_and_colors: "mad men" will return to the air in early 2012 for a final three-season run, the creator of the ad-agency drama said on thursday after announcing a resolution of tense contract negotiations.
